name: Busy Night - Demo
description:
The year is 1983, August.

You currently have a temporary job in the shopping center in your neighborhood, it is a bit far away but the salary is worth the trip.

During one of the worst heat waves of the year, you get a call from your boss: Your coworker is missing and you have to go cover her night shift.

The beginning of the night passes normally until you discover that one of the mannequins in the storehouse is no longer in its place.

Busy Night is a DEMO of an indie horror game under development made by me, if you find any bug while playing it, please let me know

Have fun!! 

 :D
